item.description:
I shall be guest-hosting the "Across the Bridge" game night at Panera Bread in Beverly for Jeremy while he is away.  While I do not have the same deep and interesting strategy games he has, I should have at least one game for every taste.  Also please feel free to bring your own.

You know the drill.  Nothin' too fancy here, just good company and a fun game or two before the early curfew. ;-)  But we have discovered Panera isn't in a rush to kick us out exactly at 9 so you can finish what you start.

As per the usual, since this is a public restaurant, please order a little something at least as we are customers using their dining space.  

Hope to see you! :-)

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: "Across the Bridge" Game Night
